name: Monsoon Malabar Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
Wake up to the aroma of Monsoon Malabar. This unique coffee undergoes a meticulous monsooning process, where carefully selected Baarbara Estate beans are exposed to the moisture-laden winds of the Indian monsoon, enhancing their bold character and smooth texture. The result? A cup brimming with earthy, spicy notes and a mellow, full-bodied richness.

Origin - Baarbara, Chikmagalur, Karnataka

Altitude - 4500 ft - 5000 ft

Varietal - SLN 795

Roasted for - Filter

Recommended Brewing Equipment - V60 and Inverted Aeropress

Enjoy a distinctive brew with low acidity and an indulgent depth of flavor in every sip.
